content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the šiauliai district court the case involves a divorce between an applicant and a defendant the applicant is seeking the division of matrimonial property including a land plot dwellings buildings and an audi car the law states that property should be divided equally between spouses in the absence of dispute the evidence supports the division of property various articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property are discussed the applicant is also seeking the dissolution of the marriage payment of a debt and reimbursement of costs the applicant provides evidence of the defendants fault in the marriage breakdown mediation was attempted but unsuccessful the defendant has not responded or participated in the proceedings a third party has filed a statement of defense but was not present at the hearing an institution has provided an opinion supporting the applicants request for custody of the children the court will consider all factors in making a decision the court has divided the property equally between the parties and approved the dissolution of the marriage the court also holds the civil registry office at fault for the issues between the spouses the court has determined the value of the property and awarded ownership accordingly the applicant is granted ownership of certain properties while the defendant is awarded ownership of other properties and an audi car there is a party called ant who owes a total of eur 18670 which is divided among the parties involved in a credit agreement
